traverseCityStatePark.title: Traverse City State Park
traverseCityStatePark.content: Located on the east arm of Grand Traverse Bay, this park offers a beautiful beach and is close to the city. Traverse City State Park features a quarter-mile of Grand Traverse Bay shoreline and offers a unique urban camping experience with easy access to downtown.
traverseCityStatePark.cancellationPolicy: Non Refundable reservation fee (paid at the time a reservation is booked): $8 for reservations made online and $10 for reservations made through the call center. $10 cancellation/modification fee. Reduced-stay fee (an incremental fee determined by the length of time a reservation is held and the number of eligible nights canceled).

traverseCityKoa.title: Traverse City KOA
traverseCityKoa.content: Family-friendly campground with amenities including a pool, mini-golf, and more. This KOA offers a perfect blend of comfort and outdoor recreation with activities for campers of all ages.
traverseCityKoa.guidelines: 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pets Friendly for a fee ($25 per day per dog), Quiet Hours: 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM
traverseCityKoa.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations for RV/tent sites (7+ days), cabins (14+ days), and lodges/studios (1+ month) incur a $25 fee; cancellations after these windows forfeit the deposit. Changes follow the same timeline.

anchorInn.title: Anchor Inn
anchorInn.address: 12068 S W Bay Shore Dr, Traverse City, MI 49684
anchorInn.content: Comfortable lodging near the water with various accommodation options. Anchor Inn offers a mix of unique cabins with easy access to Grand Traverse Bay and downtown.
anchorInn.guidelines: 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pet Friendly for a fee ($30 for one night, $55 for two or more nights)
anchorInn.petRules: Pet Friendly for a fee ($30 for one night, $55 for two or more nights)
anchorInn.cancellationPolicy: For nightly reservations, cancellations within 7 days of arrival are non-refundable, 8-30 days incur a 15% fee, and cancellations more than 30 days out are fully refundable; rescheduling within 7 days also carries a 15% fee and voids future refunds. For weekly reservations (7+ nights), cancellations within 30 days are non-refundable, while cancellations 30 days or more before arrival incur a 15% fee.

leelanauPines.title: Leelanau Pines Campground
leelanauPines.address: 6500 E. Leelanau Pines Drive, Cedar, MI 49621
leelanauPines.content: Set along the beautiful shores of Lake Leelanau, Leelanau Pines Campground offers a perfect waterfront getaway with tent sites and cozy cabins, both featuring stunning lake views and easy water access. It's a favorite for boating, fishing, and water sports, while peaceful sunrises and nearby Leelanau Peninsula wineries make it an ideal spot for both relaxation and local exploration.
leelanauPines.distanceToTown: 15 minutes from Suttons Bay, 20 minutes from downtown Leland, and 25 minutes from Traverse City
leelanauPines.guidelines: 8 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pet Friendly for RV & Tent Sites and Select Lodging, Quiet Hours: 11:00 PM - 8:00 AM
leelanauPines.cancellationPolicy: RV & Tent Cancellations: Cancel 2+ weeks before arrival: Refund minus $25 fee or full camp credit. Cancel 1+ week before arrival: 50% camp credit, 50% forfeited. Cancel less than 1 week before: Full forfeiture. Lodging Cancellations: Cancel 3+ weeks before arrival: Refund minus $25 fee or full camp credit. Cancel 2+ weeks before arrival: 50% camp credit, 50% forfeited. Cancel less than 2 weeks before: Full forfeiture.

timberRidge.title: Timber Ridge Recreation Area
timberRidge.address: 4050 E Hammond Rd, Traverse City, MI 49686
timberRidge.content: Timber Ridge is a highly-rated campground nestled in the lush woodlands just outside Traverse City, Michigan. Known for its family-friendly atmosphere and proximity to local attractions, it offers a perfect blend of outdoor adventure and modern conveniences.
timberRidge.guidelines: Tent & RV - 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Lodging - 7 (depending on lodging type), Pet Friendly for a fee ($10 per night), Quiet Hours: 11:00 PM
timberRidge.cancellationPolicy: A $15 processing fee applies to all cancellations. You may cancel up to 30 days prior to arrival for a refund, minus the fee. Reservations canceled within 30 days of arrival are non-refundable. Rescheduling is permitted within the same calendar year.

whiteWaterPark.title: White Water Park Campground
whiteWaterPark.content: Whitewater Campground is a scenic, family-friendly campground nestled along the shores of Elk Lake, offering a peaceful retreat with easy access to Traverse City and the beauty of Northern Michigan. Whether you're looking to relax by the water or explore the nearby hiking trails and charming towns, Whitewater Campground is an excellent home base for your adventure.
whiteWaterPark.distanceToTown: 15 minutes from Suttons Bay, 20 minutes from downtown Leland, and 25 minutes from Traverse City
whiteWaterPark.guidelines: Maximum of 6 people per site, 2 vehicles per site. Maximum of 2 adult sleeping units per site; the second unit must be registered with the ranger station at check-in and will be charged an additional fee of $25 per night. Quiet hours: 10:00 PM - 7:00 AM
whiteWaterPark.cancellationPolicy: If you cancel at least 14 days before your arrival, you will receive a refund minus an $8.00 reservation fee and the first night's camping fee. If you cancel less than 14 days before your arrival, no refund will be issued. Full refunds for camping fees may be given only under limited circumstances and must be approved by the Parks & Recreation Manager. The $8.00 reservation fee is non-refundable under any circumstances. No refunds will be issued for early departure due to weather or other natural conditions.

indianRiver.title: Indian River RV Resort
indianRiver.address: 561 N. Straits Hwy., Indian River, MI 49749
indianRiver.content: Indian River RV Resort in Michigan offers a family-friendly camping experience with spacious RV sites and cozy log cabins. Enjoy amenities like a heated pool, playground, camp store, and easy access to nearby lakes for outdoor activities, making it the perfect base for relaxation and adventure.
indianRiver.guidelines: Lodging - 4 Guests Maximum, Tent & RV - 8 Guests Maximum, Pet Friendly, Quiet Hours: 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM
indianRiver.cancellationPolicy: All reservations require the first night's deposit. There is a $20 cancellation fee if you cancel your reservation at least 30 days in advance. Your deposit will be held as a credit for 12 months if you cancel 8-30 days in advance. No deposits will be refunded for cancellations within a week of your scheduled arrival, and no refunds will be issued after check-in.

stIgnaceKoa.title: St. Ignace KOA
stIgnaceKoa.content: St. Ignace KOA offers a scenic, family-friendly camping experience with stunning views of the Straits of Mackinac, located near Mackinac Island. Enjoy full-hookup RV sites, cozy tent sites, and amenities like a playground, picnic areas, fire pits, Wi-Fi, and easy access to water activities and hiking trails.
stIgnaceKoa.guidelines: Tent & RV - 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Lodging - 8 Guests Maximum, Pet Friendly, Quiet Hours: 11:00 PM - 7:00 AM
stIgnaceKoa.cancellationPolicy: RV & Tent Sites: Cancellations must be made at least 7 days before arrival to receive a refund minus a $20 administrative fee. Cancellations within 7 days forfeit the first night's fee. Lodging (Deluxe Cabins/Glamping Tents/Camping Cabins): Cancellations must be made at least 14 days before arrival to receive a refund minus a $20 administrative fee. Cancellations within 14 days forfeit the full deposit.

straitsStatePark.title: Straits State Park
straitsStatePark.content: Straits State Park is home to 181 acres of recreation with views of the Mackinac Bridge and Straits of Mackinac. The park features a campground, overnight lodging facilities, picnic areas, viewing platforms, a playground and a waterfront area along Lake Huron.
straitsStatePark.guidelines: RV, Tent - 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Lodging - 4 Guests Maximum, Pet Friendly, Quiet Hours: 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM
straitsStatePark.cancellationPolicy: Non Refundable reservation fee (paid at the time a reservation is booked): $8 for reservations made online. $10 cancellation/modification fee. If you cancel or reduce nights on a reservation prior to your scheduled arrival, it will result in the forfeiture of the reservation fee, the cancel/modification fee, plus a fee that is a percentage of the cost of all forfeited nights.

cabinsOfMackinaw.title: Cabins of Mackinaw
cabinsOfMackinaw.address: 712 S Huron Ave, Mackinaw City, MI 49701
cabinsOfMackinaw.content: The Cabins of Mackinac in Mackinaw City, Michigan, offer private cabins with hotel-quality amenities, located directly across from the Mackinac Island ferry docks
cabinsOfMackinaw.cancellationPolicy: 72 Hour Cancellation Policy - Reservations must be cancelled by noon three days before day of arrival. Reservations made within 72 hours of arrival are effective, final and irrevocable immediately upon booking and cannot be cancelled without penalty.

teePeeCampground.title: TeePee Campground
teePeeCampground.content: Tee Pee Campground in Mackinaw City offers a relaxed, family-friendly camping experience with stunning views of the Mackinac Bridge and Island. Guests enjoy spacious sites for tents and RVs, amenities like restrooms, showers, and a camp store, plus easy access to Mackinac Island ferries and local attractions.
teePeeCampground.guidelines: 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pet Friendly
teePeeCampground.cancellationPolicy: Cancelling your reservation on the day of or within 7 days prior to arrival will result in no refund. Cancellations 8 or more days will receive a full refund minus a $10 processing fee.

munisingKoa.title: Munising KOA
munisingKoa.content: Munising KOA provides a comfortable camping experience with excellent amenities and a prime location for exploring Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore. Set amongst tall pine trees, this well-maintained campground offers a variety of site options and is known for its friendly staff and clean facilities. The campground's central location makes it easy to access all the natural wonders of the Pictured Rocks area.
munisingKoa.distanceToTown: 6 minutes from Downtown Munising, 9 minutes from Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore
munisingKoa.guidelines: RV, Tent - 6 Guests Maximum, Lodging - 4 Guests Maximum, Pet Friendly, Quiet Hours: 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM
munisingKoa.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations for RV/tent sites (7+ days), cabins (14+ days), and lodges/studios (1+ month) incur a $25 fee; cancellations after these windows forfeit the deposit. Changes follow the same timelines.

touristPark.title: Tourist Park Campground
touristPark.content: Located in Munising, Tourist Park Campground offers a perfect balance of convenience and natural beauty, with tent sites situated along the shores of the Anna River. This peaceful park is a great option for those looking to explore the wonders of Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore while being close to town.
touristPark.distanceToTown: 4 minutes from Downtown Munising, 9 minutes from Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore
touristPark.guidelines: 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pet Friendly
touristPark.cancellationPolicy: All cancellations done before or 3 days prior to arrival will be assessed a $20 fee. All cancellations that occur within 72 hours prior to your arrival are charged 50% of their current reservation. If the cancellation is for a one-night stay you will be billed the one night.

uncleDuckysAuTrain.title: Uncle Ducky's - Au Train
uncleDuckysAuTrain.address: E4947 Hwy M-28 Au Train, Michigan 49806
uncleDuckysAuTrain.content: Uncle Ducky's in Au Train offers a unique adventure-focused camping experience with convenient access to kayaking, paddleboarding, and other water sports. Located just a short drive from Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, this campground caters to outdoor enthusiasts looking to maximize their exploration of the area. The campground features rustic tent sites and is known for its guided tours and rental equipment, making it easy to experience the beauty of Lake Superior and the surrounding landscape.
uncleDuckysAuTrain.distanceToTown: 15 minutes from Munising, 5 minutes from Au Train Beach
uncleDuckysAuTrain.guidelines: 8 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pet Friendly with a Fee
uncleDuckysAuTrain.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations up to 14 days before arrival: $25 fee only. Cancellations within 14 days: $25 fee plus the cost of one night's stay. Cancellations within 72 hours of check-in: No refund. No refund for early checkouts.

uncleDuckysPaddlersVillage.title: Uncle Ducky's Paddlers Village
uncleDuckysPaddlersVillage.content: Paddlers Village Accommodation in Au Train offers a unique, adventure-focused stay with easy access to kayaking, paddleboarding, and other water sports. Located just a short drive from Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, this accommodation is ideal for outdoor enthusiasts looking to fully explore the area. Featuring comfortable, rustic lodging options, Paddlers Village is known for its proximity to guided tours and rental equipment, allowing guests to easily enjoy the beauty of Lake Superior and the surrounding landscape.
uncleDuckysPaddlersVillage.guidelines: 8 Guests Maximum Per Site, Pet Friendly with a Fee
uncleDuckysPaddlersVillage.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations up to 14 days before arrival: $25 fee only. Cancellations within 14 days: $25 fee plus the cost of one night's stay. Cancellations within 72 hours of check-in: No refund. No refund for early checkouts.

fortSuperior.title: Fort Superior Campground
fortSuperior.address: N7685 Old Golf Course Rd. Munising, MI 49862
fortSuperior.content: Fort Superior Campground is a hidden gem located near Munising, offering a unique camping experience surrounded by dense forests and rugged landscapes. This more rustic campground may require some walking to reach your site, but the breathtaking views of Lake Superior make it worthwhile. Perfect for those seeking solitude and a deeper connection with nature, campers enjoy direct access to the lake, ideal for fishing, kayaking, and soaking in the stunning scenery. The campground is also conveniently situated near several historical sites, including the famous Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, making it an excellent base for outdoor adventures.
fortSuperior.distanceToTown: 10 minutes from downtown Munising, where you can find shops, restaurants, and access to Pictured Rocks.
fortSuperior.guidelines: 6 Guests Maximum Per Site, 2 vehicles per site
fortSuperior.cancellationPolicy: Full payment is required at the time of reservation, and all cancellations or changes must be submitted via email to fortsuperiorcampground@gmail.com. A $25 cancellation fee applies for cancellations made up to two weeks prior to check-in; within two weeks, the fee is $25 plus one full night's stay. No refunds will be issued for cancellations within three days of check-in or for early check-outs, and credit card processing fees are non-refundable.

auTrainLake.title: Au Train Lake Campground
auTrainLake.address: E6031 Forest Lake Rd, Au Train, MI 49806
auTrainLake.content: Au Train Lake Campground offers a peaceful lakeside camping experience with a focus on fishing, boating, and water recreation. Located in the heart of the Hiawatha National Forest, this campground provides a serene escape with direct access to Au Train Lake. The surrounding forest creates a private atmosphere for campers looking to connect with nature, while still being within driving distance of popular attractions like Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.
auTrainLake.distanceToTown: 20 minutes from Munising, 10 minutes from Au Train
auTrainLake.guidelines: 8 Guests Maximum Per Site, 2 vehicles per site
auTrainLake.cancellationPolicy: Cancellations made 3 or more days before arrival receive a full refund minus the reservation fee. Cancellations within 3 days of arrival forfeit the first night's camping fee plus the reservation fee.
